awd_titl_txt: Aspen Winter Conference on Elementary Particle Physics;     Aspen, Colorado; January 6-12, 1991
awd_abstract_narration: This award will support in part the 1991 Aspen Winter                      Elementary Particle Physics Conference; Aspen Colorado; January                 6-12, 1991.  This conference is devoted to the "physics at                      higher luminosity".  The conference will cover the latest                       results from LEP (CERN Switzerland) experiments on the physics                  of the Z boson and their implications for the so called                         "standard model" of electroweak interactions.  Among others,                    sessions will cover the properties of the Z and W bosons,                       search for the top quark, b quark physics, c quark physics,                     precision electroweak physics and facilities and detectors for                  high luminosity.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
